query:
INSERT INTO life_experiments (title, description, hypothesis, duration, checkInPrompts, themeId, isActive, createdAt) VALUES
('The Death Meditation', 'Each evening, spend 5 minutes contemplating your mortality. Imagine this was your last day. What would you regret not doing? What would you let go of?', 'Regular contemplation of mortality clarifies priorities and reduces anxiety about trivial concerns.', 7, JSON_ARRAY('How did this practice shift your perspective today?', 'What did you realize about your priorities?'), 'death-impermanence', true, NOW()),
('The Suffering Inquiry', 'When you experience emotional pain, pause and ask: ''What is the story I''m telling myself?'' Write down the story, then ask: ''Is this absolutely true?'' Investigate.', 'Investigating the stories we tell ourselves reduces emotional suffering and increases psychological freedom.', 7, JSON_ARRAY('What story did you catch today?', 'How did questioning it change your experience?'), 'suffering-growth', true, NOW()),
('The Purpose Experiment', 'Each day, ask yourself: ''If I knew I would die in one year, what would I do differently today?'' Act on at least one insight from this question.', 'Connecting daily actions to deeper purpose increases motivation and life satisfaction.', 7, JSON_ARRAY('What insight did you gain today?', 'What action did you take?'), 'purpose-meaning', true, NOW()),
('The Gratitude Practice', 'Each morning, write down three things you''re grateful for before checking your phone. Notice how this shifts your baseline mood and attention throughout the day.', 'Deliberate gratitude practice rewires the brain toward positivity and increases overall wellbeing.', 7, JSON_ARRAY('How did your mood shift throughout the day?', 'What unexpected gratitude did you discover?'), 'presence-awareness', true, NOW()),
('The Pause Experiment', 'Before responding to any request or question, pause for three conscious breaths. Notice the space between stimulus and response.', 'Creating space between stimulus and response increases conscious choice and reduces reactive behavior.', 5, JSON_ARRAY('How many times did you remember to pause?', 'What changed when you paused?'), 'presence-awareness', true, NOW()),
('The Ego Observation', 'Throughout the day, notice when you feel the need to defend, justify, or prove yourself. Simply observe without judgment. Keep a log of these moments.', 'Observing ego patterns without judgment creates distance from them and reduces their control over behavior.', 7, JSON_ARRAY('How many ego moments did you notice?', 'What patterns emerged?'), 'ego-self', true, NOW()),
('The Kindness Challenge', 'Perform one anonymous act of kindness each day. It can be small—leaving a kind note, paying for someone''s coffee, or helping without being asked. Tell no one.', 'Anonymous kindness practice increases compassion and reveals the intrinsic rewards of giving.', 7, JSON_ARRAY('What act of kindness did you perform?', 'How did it feel to give without recognition?'), 'relationships', true, NOW());
